title: kANa Aval
sahitya:
kANa Aval koNDEngum enniru vizhigaL avar divya darishanam


anupallavi

  vAnudal malar maduvarunda aDangAda dAhamuDan manamOhana kamala vazhi


caraNam    sadA avar arugilirindu tiruvaDi malar toNDu
 vidam vidamAi purindu iNaiyil pErinba vIDu pera (u)kazhalum mana vaNDuDanE
